text: Hi How to set multiple language in a HubSpot app?

Hey,

Have you tried to generate a new Token from HubSpot after adding content scope?
I am creating a HubSpot App and need help with how we can set multi-lingual content for app title. description
I am creating a HubSpot App and need help with how we can set multi-lingual content for app title. description
Hy everybody, can anyone tell me where can I find the info in json format after creating a property for a company? Where can I find in HubSpot the fields "createdAt" or "updatedAt"?

Hi <@U02BLRT376H>

I'm not sure for your exact requirements but, You can get the Company response in JSON format via this API:
<https://api.hubapi.com/companies/v2/companies/10444744?hapikey=your_hapi_key|https://api.hubapi.com/companies/v2/companies/10444744?hapikey=your_hapi_key>

Would you please check in the section named `Properties` of any company? Open a company, click on the Properties button as shown in the attached image. Search for `Create Date` & `Last Activity Date`

I hope this will help!!
